projects.title: Guia
projects.subtitle: Museum Guide App with Image Recognition
projects.description: Guía (//'ɡi.a/) is an innovative museum guide application designed to revolutionize the museum experience. By simply pointing a camera, it effortlessly recognizes artworks and provides detailed descriptions, enriching visitors' engagement with the exhibits. Developed with a focus on user convenience, Guía is accessible through web browsers, following a mobile-first design approach.

projects.title: ADM Programming Language
projects.subtitle: Bisaya Programming Language
projects.description: ADM comes from the Bisaya word "adunami" which means "we have" because we have created a programming language! It is a recursive descent programming language that is built on top of C++ to compile the source code to MIPS assembly ISA.
